ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Bazzar location?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Bazaar is a zone in the Shadows of Luclin expansion. You can only get there if you have it installed. It connects to the Shadowhaven and Nexus zones.
ygData.messageBody:
jstrackeicg wrote:
> I know this may seem like a rather stupid question, but please humor
> me. I only have the PoP expansion, I play on the Mael.. Star..
> (something like that) server. Where is/How do you get to the Bazzar
> that I have heard so much about.
> Thank you in advance for your time.

The Bazaar is a zone in the Shadows of Luclin expansion. You can only
get there if you have it installed.

It connects to the Shadowhaven and Nexus zones.
